JobFullDesc:
WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR

Connected data, inventory and membership are foundational pillars of the One Nike Marketplace strategy. Establishing these deeper connections with our wholesale partners are critical to knowing and serving today’s digitally savvy consumers.
To help drive this work, we are looking for a Customer Management Platform Business Manager. Sitting on our Global Partner Governance Team, the Global Customer Management Platform Business Manager will be responsible for bringing business perspective to the new Customer Management Platform Tech solution and manage the quality of the Customer data with the Geo partners!
Customer Management Platform Business Manager will be responsible for business implementation of the new Platform inclusive of managing the transition from current to new business solution and onboarding Nike Geographies.
The candidate needs to have very good level of understanding of data and data platforms: ability to read, write and communicate data in context, including an understanding of data sources and constructs, ability to describe the use case, application and resulting value. The candidate needs to have project management and problem-solving skills as well as functional knowledge in sales, retail or operations. Experience with CRM platforms will be highly valued!

WHAT YOU WILL WORK ON

If this is you, you’ll be working with the Product Director and Engineering team to implement new Customer Management Platform. You will also work with Global and Geo Nike Wholesale Partners and Nike Direct Teams as well as with Global Enterprise Data &Analytics teams to ensure that we are building the processes and rules to protect Nike, our wholesale partners, and consumers.

Work will be focused on:


Supporting the design of new Customer Management Platform: Ensuring Key Partner’s and Nike Direct business needs are being appropriately reflected in the new solution, validating the capture of needed attributes, metrics and maintaining the ability to deliver business reports. Engaging with the Geo partners to make sure their business needs are met by the new system.
Implementation of new Customer Management Platform: Support data conversion activities from Salesforce to Microsoft Dynamics led by Product Director, Engineering and Integrator’s Teams. Partner with Transition Management to prepare the training materials and help drive “Train the Trainer” sessions for Global and Geo users in cooperation with appropriate partners. In addition, monitor activation and Go-Live activities for new system.
Aligning with Strategic Enterprise Capabilities (SEC) teams: coordinating and communicating with SEC partners to represent Nike Partner’s needs to successfully launch Customer Data Platform in support of North America Marketplace Activation.
Communication: Establish and help execute communication plan for implementation of the new Customer Management Platform. Work closely with Geo Partner Governance and the Geo Data Stewards Teams to keep them informed and engaged in the process of Testing, Training and Go-Live.
Policies and Procedures: Implement and ensure globally aligned data governance processes to ultimately provide one single source of truth for Customer Data sourced at new Customer Management Platform- with close partnership with ED&A Teams. Partner with Geos to ensure we are building governance around One Nike Marketplace (connected inventory, data and membership).


WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH

This is the Nike matrix: This role will be part of cross functional team of Product Director/Manager, System Engineers, Data Architects, Enterprise Data and Analytics and System Integrators that is passionate about design and implementation of new Customer Data Platform based on Microsoft Dynamics solution. Working closely with other members of the Partner Governance Team on crafting and executing policies and procedures to protect and maintain high quality of Nike customer’s data. Lastly you will also work with SEC capability leads to ensure successful Customer Data Platform implementation in support of Marketplace Activation North America.
